title: Smokey Robinson - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/6/22
itunes:title: Smokey Robinson - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/6/22
description:
George Noory and legendary Motown singer Smokey Robinson discuss his music career, growing up with Aretha Franklin, and how Barry Gordy convinced him to re-record his first song "Shop Around" to make it into a hit.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
